The service is already registered with the release, invoke the parents awake and this services awake by nudging the selector from blocking.

getClients

public java.util.Set<Client> getClients()
Returns the set of clients this Worker is handling. This should only be used for iterative purposes, it returns the internal set managed by the Worker.

Specified by:
